remarks:
Distributive law for complex numbers (left-distributivity).  Axiom 11 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axdistr .  Proofs should normally use ~ adddi instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Distributive law for complex numbers (left-distributivity).  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axdistr .  Proofs should normally use ~ adddi instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-distr $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( A x. ( B + C ) ) = ( ( A x. B ) + ( A x. C ) ) ) $.
